Reviews.Title: Flipping Phone
Reviews.Author: Richard Delaney, author: Armorwear
Reviews.Content: Good phone but all the previous owners contact list and personal pictures were still in phone. Beeping sound in phone while in use?

Reviews.Title: I Hate It
Reviews.Author: Dalewanda Griffith
Reviews.Content: It Stopped working out of no where. This was the worse product ever ! The owner should be ashamed for selling a type of product like that.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, simple to use.
Reviews.Author: Brett Losey "brett"
Reviews.Content: I love that this thing can be used like an old phone with a nice keypad rather than a touchscreen only.  Would definitely get again.

ProductInfo.Features:
check with service provider on service compatability
contact us for more info on the phone if needed.
ProductInfo.Name: Sprint Samsung SPH M520 Cell Phone
